name: wp-menu-control
description: WP Menu Control lets you conditionally display each menu item based on factors like user role, device, date, pages, and more.
author: Reza Sarailoo

scripts.build:production: composer install && composer phpcs && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && composer test && npm run test:unit && composer language && && npm install npm run build && npm run plugin-zip
